parameters.jsCode:
// Convert unique profiles to array of items for Google Sheets append
// Include ALL available fields from Search Export + Profile Scraper
const data = $input.first().json;
const profiles = data.uniqueProfiles;

return profiles.map(p => ({
  json: {
    profileUrl: p.profileUrl || p.linkedinProfileUrl || '',
    fullName: p.fullName || '',
    firstName: p.firstName || '',
    lastName: p.lastName || '',
    headline: p.headline || '',
    location: p.location || '',
    company: p.company || p.job1Company || '',
    companyUrl: p.companyUrl || p.companyLinkedinUrl || '',
    companyId: p.companyId || '',
    companySlug: p.companySlug || '',
    industry: p.industry || p.companyIndustry || '',
    company2: p.company2 || p.job2Company || '',
    companyUrl2: p.companyUrl2 || '',
    jobTitle: p.jobTitle || p.job1Title || '',
    jobDateRange: p.jobDateRange || p.job1Duration || '',
    jobTitle2: p.jobTitle2 || p.job2Title || '',
    jobDateRange2: p.jobDateRange2 || p.job2Duration || '',
    school: p.school || '',
    schoolDegree: p.schoolDegree || '',
    schoolDateRange: p.schoolDateRange || '',
    school2: p.school2 || '',
    schoolDegree2: p.schoolDegree2 || '',
    schoolDateRange2: p.schoolDateRange2 || '',
    connectionDegree: p.connectionDegree || '',
    additionalInfo: p.additionalInfo || '',
    vmid: p.vmid || '',
    profileImageUrl: p.profileImageUrl || '',
    // Profile Scraper enriched fields
    summary: p.summary || '',
    companyWebsite: p.companyWebsite || '',
    companySize: p.companySize || '',
    companyIndustry: p.companyIndustry || p.industry || '',
    companyDescription: p.companyDescription || '',
    companyLinkedinUrl: p.companyLinkedinUrl || p.companyUrl || '',
    skills: p.skills || '',
    timestamp: p.timestamp || new Date().toISOString()
  }
}));

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ success: true, message: 'Pipeline monitor completed', timestamp: new Date().toISOString() }) }}
